topic.title: Importing Classes for Interaction with the Host

dd.p: This section tells you how to import the classes that you require to control interaction with the host.
Two classes are required for interaction with the host:
Follow the procedure below to import the classes you require for interaction with the host.

stentry.StepText: Type these two lines in the importsection of the file:
stentry.draft-comment: You have successfully imported the files you require for interaction with the host.
